special_text:
[i](Choose only one work as a sorcery to add its ability.)[/i]
When Kanghyae Forum enters the battlefield, you may return another permanent you control to its owner’s hand. If you don’t, draw a card.
{2}{G}: [i]A Common Good[/i]
If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates that many of those tokens plus one instead.
{2}{W}: [i]Rebuilding Trust[/i]
If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts that many of those counters plus one on that permanent instead.
